verses.verse: And <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1722> the second sabbath after the first,<WG1207> <WG4521> that he<WG846> went<WG1279> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> corn fields;<WG4702> and<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> plucked<WG5089> the<WG3588> ears of corn,<WG4719> and<WG2532> did eat,<WG2068> rubbing<WG5597> them in their hands.<WG5495>

And <WG1161> certain<WG5100> of the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Why<WG5101> do<WG4160> ye that which<WG3739> is not lawful<WG1832> <WG3756> to do<WG4160> on<WG1722> the<WG3588> sabbath days<WG4521>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> <WG4314> them<WG846> said,<WG2036> Have ye not read so much as <WG3761> <WG314> this, <WG5124> what<WG3739> David<WG1138> did,<WG4160> when<WG3698> himself<WG846> was hungry,<WG3983> and<WG2532> they which were<WG5607> with<WG3326> him; <WG846>

How <WG5613> he went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> house<WG3624> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> did take<WG2983> and<WG2532> eat<WG5315> the<WG3588> shewbread, <WG740> <WG4286> and <WG2532> gave<WG1325> also<WG2532> to them<WG3588> that were with<WG3326> him;<WG846> which<WG3739> it is not lawful <WG1832> <WG3756> to eat<WG5315> but<WG1508> for the<WG3588> priests<WG2409> alone? <WG3441>
And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> That <WG3754> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> is<WG2076> Lord<WG2962> also<WG2532> of the<WG3588> sabbath. <WG4521>

And <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> also<WG2532> on<WG1722> another<WG2087> sabbath,<WG4521> that he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> synagogue<WG4864> and<WG2532> taught:<WG1321> and<WG2532> there<WG1563> was<WG2258> a man<WG444> <WG2532> whose<WG846> right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> was<WG2258> withered.<WG3584>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330> watched<WG3906> him,<WG846> whether<WG1487> he would heal<WG2323> on<WG1722> the<WG3588> sabbath day;<WG4521> that<WG2443> they might find<WG2147> an accusation<WG2724> against him.<WG846>

But <WG1161> he<WG846> knew<WG1492> their<WG846> thoughts,<WG1261> and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to the<WG3588> man<WG444> which had<WG2192> the withered<WG3584> hand,<WG5495> Rise up,<WG1453> and<WG2532> stand forth<WG2476> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> midst. <WG3319> And<WG1161> he<WG3588> arose<WG450> and stood forth.<WG2476>

Then <WG3767> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> I will ask<WG1905> you<WG5209> one thing;<WG5101> Is it lawful<WG1832> on the<WG3588> sabbath days<WG4521> to do good,<WG15> or<WG2228> to do evil?<WG2554> to save<WG4982> life,<WG5590> or<WG2228> to destroy<WG622> it?

And <WG2532> looking round about upon<WG4017> them<WG846> all,<WG3956> he said<WG2036> unto the<WG3588> man,<WG444> Stretch forth<WG1614> thy<WG4675> hand. <WG5495> And<WG1161> he<WG3588> did<WG4160> so:<WG3779> and<WG2532> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> was restored<WG600> whole<WG5199> as<WG5613> the<WG3588> other.<WG243>
And <WG1161> they<WG846> were filled<WG4130> with madness;<WG454> and<WG2532> communed<WG1255> one with another<WG240> <WG4314> what<WG5101> they might do<WG4160> <WG302> to Jesus.<WG2424>

And <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> in<WG1722> those<WG5025> days,<WG2250> that he went out<WG1831> into<WG1519> a mountain<WG3735> to pray,<WG4336> and<WG2532> continued all night<WG2258> <WG1273> in<WG1722> prayer<WG4335> to God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> it was<WG1096> day,<WG2250> he called<WG4377> unto him his<WG848> disciples:<WG3101> and<WG2532> of<WG575> them<WG846> he chose<WG1586> twelve,<WG1427> whom<WG3739> also<WG2532> he named<WG3687> apostles;<WG652>

Simon, <WG4613> (whom<WG3739> he also<WG2532> named<WG3687> Peter,)<WG4074> and<WG2532> Andrew<WG406> his<WG846> brother,<WG80> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> Philip<WG5376> and<WG2532> Bartholomew,<WG918>
Matthew <WG3156> and<WG2532> Thomas,<WG2381> James<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Alphaeus,<WG256> and<WG2532> Simon<WG4613> called<WG2564> Zelotes,<WG2208>
And Judas<WG2455> the brother of James,<WG2385> and<WG2532> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot,<WG2469> which<WG3739> also<WG2532> was<WG1096> the traitor.<WG4273>

And <WG2532> he came down<WG2597> with<WG3326> them,<WG846> and stood<WG2476> in<WG1909> the plain,<WG3977> <WG5117> and<WG2532> the company<WG3793> of his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> of people<WG2992> out of<WG575> all<WG3956> Judea<WG2449> and<WG2532> Jerusalem,<WG2419> and<WG2532> from the<WG3588> sea coast<WG3882> of Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon,<WG4605> which<WG3739> came<WG2064> to hear<WG191> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> to be healed<WG2390> of<WG575> their<WG848> diseases;<WG3554>
And <WG2532> they that were vexed<WG3791> with<WG5259> unclean<WG169> spirits:<WG4151> and<WG2532> they were healed.<WG2323>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> whole<WG3956> multitude<WG3793> sought<WG2212> to touch<WG680> him:<WG846> for<WG3754> there went virtue out<WG1831> <WG1411> of<WG3844> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> healed<WG2390> them all.<WG3956>

And <WG2532> he<WG846> lifted up<WG1869> his<WG848> eyes<WG3788> on<WG1519> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and said,<WG3004> Blessed <WG3107> be ye poor: <WG4434> for<WG3754> yours<WG5212> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God. <WG2316>
Blessed <WG3107> are ye that hunger<WG3983> now: <WG3568> for<WG3754> ye shall be filled.<WG5526> Blessed<WG3107> are ye that weep<WG2799> now: <WG3568> for<WG3754> ye shall laugh. <WG1070>

Blessed <WG3107> are<WG2075> ye, when<WG3752> men<WG444> shall hate<WG3404> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> when<WG3752> they shall separate<WG873> you<WG5209> from their company, and<WG2532> shall reproach<WG3679> you, and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> your<WG5216> name<WG3686> as<WG5613> evil,<WG4190> for the Son of man's sake. <WG1752> <WG3588> <WG5207> <WG444>

Rejoice <WG5463> ye in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day,<WG2250> and<WG2532> leap for joy: <WG4640> for,<WG1063> behold,<WG2400> your<WG5216> reward<WG3408> is great<WG4183> in<WG1722> heaven: <WG3772> for<WG1063> in the like manner <WG2596> <WG5024> did <WG4160> their<WG846> fathers<WG3962> unto the<WG3588> prophets. <WG4396>
But <WG4133> woe<WG3759> unto you<WG5213> that are rich!<WG4145> for<WG3754> ye have received<WG568> your<WG5216> consolation. <WG3874>

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213> that are full<WG1705> for<WG3754> ye shall hunger.<WG3983> Woe<WG3759> unto you<WG5213> that laugh<WG1070> now!<WG3568> for<WG3754> ye shall mourn<WG3996> and<WG2532> weep. <WG2799>

Woe <WG3759> unto you,<WG5213> when<WG3752> all<WG3956> men<WG444> shall speak<WG2036> well<WG2573> of you!<WG5209> for<WG1063> so <WG2596> <WG5024> did <WG4160> their<WG846> fathers<WG3962> to the<WG3588> false prophets. <WG5578>
But <WG235> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213> which hear,<WG191> Love<WG25> your<WG5216> enemies,<WG2190> do<WG4160> good<WG2573> to them which hate<WG3404> you, <WG5209>
Bless <WG2127> them that curse<WG2672> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> pray<WG4336> for<WG5228> them which despitefully use<WG1908> you. <WG5209>

And unto him that smiteth<WG5180> thee<WG4571> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> one cheek<WG4600> offer<WG3930> also<WG2532> the<WG3588> other;<WG243> and<WG2532> him that taketh away<WG142> thy<WG4675> cloak<WG2440> forbid<WG2967> not<WG3361> to take thy coat<WG5509> also. <WG2532>
<WG1161> Give <WG1325> to every man<WG3956> that asketh<WG154> of thee;<WG4571> and<WG2532> of<WG575> him that taketh away<WG142> thy goods<WG4674> ask them not again. <WG523> <WG3361>
And <WG2532> as<WG2531> ye would<WG2309> that<WG2443> men<WG444> should do<WG4160> to you,<WG5213> do<WG4160> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> to them<WG846> likewise. <WG3668>

For <WG2532> if<WG1487> ye love<WG25> them which love<WG25> you,<WG5209> what<WG4169> thank<WG5485> have<WG2076> ye?<WG5213> for<WG1063> sinners<WG268> also<WG2532> love<WG25> those that love<WG25> them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> ye do good<WG15> to them which do good<WG15> to you,<WG5209> what<WG4169> thank<WG5485> have<WG2076> ye?<WG5213> for<WG1063> sinners<WG268> also<WG2532> do<WG4160> even<WG2532> the<WG3588> same. <WG846>

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> ye lend<WG1155> to them of<WG3844> whom<WG3739> ye hope<WG1679> to receive,<WG618> what<WG4169> thank<WG5485> have<WG2076> ye?<WG5213> for<WG1063> sinners<WG268> also<WG2532> lend<WG1155> to sinners,<WG268> to<WG2443> receive<WG618> as much again. <WG2470>

But <WG4133> love<WG25> ye your<WG5216> enemies,<WG2190> and<WG2532> do good,<WG15> and<WG2532> lend,<WG1155> hoping for nothing again; <WG560> <WG3367> and <WG2532> your<WG5216> reward<WG3408> shall be<WG2071> great,<WG4183> and<WG2532> ye shall be<WG2071> the children<WG5207> of the<WG3588> Highest: <WG5310> for<WG3754> he<WG846> is<WG2076> kind<WG5543> unto<WG1909> the<WG3588> unthankful<WG884> and<WG2532> to the evil. <WG4190>
Be <WG1096> ye therefore<WG3767> merciful,<WG3629> as<WG2531> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> also<WG2532> is<WG2076> merciful. <WG3629>

Judge <WG2919> not,<WG3361> and<WG2532> ye shall not<WG3364> be judged: <WG2919> condemn<WG2613> not,<WG3361> and<WG2532> ye shall not<WG3364> be condemned: <WG2613> forgive,<WG630> and<WG2532> ye shall be forgiven: <WG630>

Give, <WG1325> and<WG2532> it shall be given<WG1325> unto you,<WG5213> good<WG2570> measure,<WG3358> pressed down,<WG4085> and<WG2532> shaken together,<WG4531> and<WG2532> running over,<WG5240> shall men give<WG1325> into<WG1519> your<WG5216> bosom.<WG2859> For<WG1063> with the<WG3588> same<WG846> measure<WG3358> that<WG3739> ye mete<WG3354> withal it shall be measured to you again. <WG488> <WG5213>

And <WG1161> he spake<WG2036> a parable<WG3850> unto them,<WG846> Can <WG1410> <WG3385> the blind<WG5185> lead<WG3594> the blind?<WG5185> shall they not<WG3780> both<WG297> fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> the ditch? <WG999>
The disciple<WG3101> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> above<WG5228> his<WG848> master: <WG1320> but<WG1161> every one<WG3956> that is perfect<WG2675> shall be<WG2071> as<WG5613> his<WG846> master. <WG1320>

And <WG1161> why<WG5101> beholdest<WG991> thou the<WG3588> mote<WG2595> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> brother's<WG80> eye,<WG3788> but<WG1161> perceivest<WG2657> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> beam<WG1385> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thine own<WG2398> eye? <WG3788>

Either <WG2228> how<WG4459> canst<WG1410> thou say<WG3004> to thy<WG4675> brother,<WG80> Brother,<WG80> let<WG863> me pull out<WG1544> the<WG3588> mote<WG2595> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thine<WG4675> eye,<WG3788> when thou thyself<WG846> beholdest<WG991> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> beam<WG1385> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thine own<WG4675> eye?<WG3788> Thou hypocrite,<WG5273> cast out<WG1544> first<WG4412> the<WG3588> beam<WG1385> out of<WG1537> thine own<WG4675> eye,<WG3788> and<WG2532> then<WG5119> shalt thou see clearly<WG1227> to pull out<WG1544> the<WG3588> mote<WG2595> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> brother's<WG80> eye. <WG3788>

For <WG1063> a good<WG2570> tree<WG1186> bringeth not forth <WG2076> <WG3756> <WG4160> corrupt <WG4550> fruit;<WG2590> neither<WG3761> doth a corrupt<WG4550> tree<WG1186> bring forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit. <WG2590>

For <WG1063> every<WG1538> tree<WG1186> is known<WG1097> by<WG1537> his own<WG2398> fruit.<WG2590> For<WG1063> of<WG1537> thorns<WG173> men do not<WG3756> gather<WG4816> figs,<WG4810> nor<WG3761> of<WG1537> a bramble bush<WG942> gather<WG5166> they grapes. <WG4718>

A good<WG18> man<WG444> out<WG1537> of the<WG3588> good<WG18> treasure<WG2344> of his<WG848> heart<WG2588> bringeth forth<WG4393> that which is good;<WG18> and<WG2532> an evil<WG4190> man<WG444> out<WG1537> of the<WG3588> evil<WG4190> treasure<WG2344> of his<WG848> heart<WG2588> bringeth forth<WG4393> that which is evil: <WG4190> for<WG1063> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> abundance<WG4051> of the<WG3588> heart<WG2588> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> speaketh. <WG2980>
And <WG1161> why<WG5101> call<WG2564> ye me,<WG3165> Lord,<WG2962> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> not<WG3756> the things which<WG3739> I say? <WG3004>

Whosoever <WG3956> cometh<WG2064> to<WG4314> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> heareth<WG191> my<WG3450> sayings,<WG3056> and<WG2532> doeth<WG4160> them,<WG846> I will show<WG5263> you<WG5213> to whom<WG5101> he is<WG2076> like: <WG3664>

He is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a man<WG444> which built<WG3618> a house,<WG3614> and<WG3739> digged<WG4626> deep,<WG900> and<WG2532> laid<WG5087> the foundation<WG2310> on<WG1909> a rock: <WG4073> and<WG1161> when the flood<WG4132> arose,<WG1096> the<WG3588> stream<WG4215> beat vehemently upon<WG4366> that<WG1565> house,<WG3614> and<WG2532> could<WG2480> not<WG3756> shake<WG4531> it: <WG846> for<WG1063> it was founded<WG2311> upon<WG1909> a rock. <WG4073>

But <WG1161> he that heareth,<WG191> and<WG2532> doeth<WG4160> not,<WG3361> is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a man<WG444> that without<WG5565> a foundation<WG2310> built<WG3618> a house<WG3614> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> against which the stream did beat vehemently, <WG4366> <WG3739> <WG3588> <WG4215> and <WG2532> immediately<WG2112> it fell;<WG4098> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> ruin<WG4485> of that<WG1565> house<WG3614> was<WG1096> great. <WG3173>
